n = gets.to_i
arr = gets.chomp.split.map(&:to_i)
str, max = "", 0
arr.each{|x|
    str << "(" *  (x - max) if x > max
    str << ")"
    max = x if max < x
}
arr_in, arr_out, count = [], [], 0
str.each_char{|c|
    case c
    when '('
        count += 1
        arr_in << count
    when ')'
        arr_out << arr_in.pop
    end
}
puts arr == arr_out ? str : ":("

n = int(input())
a = list(map(int,input().split()))
cnt = 0
ans = ''
st = list()
for x in a:
    while cnt < x:
        ans += '('
        cnt += 1
        st.append(cnt)
    if st[-1] == x:
        st.pop()
        ans += ')'
    else:
        ans = ':('
        break
print(ans)

from collections import deque
import sys
sys.setrecursionlimit(10**7)

N = int(input())
P = list(map(int,input().split()))

Q = [-1]*N
for i,p in enumerate(P):
    Q[p-1] = i

S = ''
a = 1
def rec(l,r):
    global S,a
    if l==r:
        return
    while l < r:
        ai = Q[a-1]
        if ai >= r:
            print(':(')
            exit()
        a += 1
        S += '('
        rec(l,ai)
        S += ')'
        l = ai + 1
rec(0,N)

print(S)

import itertools as ite
from decimal import *
import math

INF = 10 ** 18

n = input()
p = map(int, raw_input().split())
S = ""
prev = [-1] * (n + 1)
nex = [0] + [-1] * (n + 1)
num_p = 0
for num in p:
    if num > num_p:
        num_next = num_p
        while num_next <= num:
            if nex[num_next] != -1:
                id = num_next
                while nex[num_next] != -1:
                    num_next = nex[num_next] + 1
                nex[id] = num_next - 1
            S += "("
            num_next += 1
        S += ")"
        nex[num] = num
        prev[num] = num
    else:
        num_prev = num_p - 1
        while prev[num_prev] != -1:
            num_prev = prev[num_prev] - 1
        if num_prev != num:
            print ":("
            exit()
        prev[num_p] = num_prev
        nex[num] = num
        prev[num] = num
        S += ")"
    num_p = num
print S
